articles.title: Truckers in Argentina end protest that threatened grains transport -ministry
articles.description: Argentinian truckers agreed on Thursday night to call off a strike that had paralyzed grains transport in the country since Monday, the transport ministry said. Truckers represented by the Federation of Argentine Carriers (FETRA) had been demanding higher freight rates and talks with the government on Wednesday failed to make progress.

articles.description: The huge wound was first noticed by lifeguards off the coast of Argentina, who initiated a rescue.
articles.content:
